definition: to place limits on extent or access
details:
verb
- to place limits on extent or access
= synonyms: bound
- to restrict or confine
= example: to restrict or confine
- to close within bounds, limit or hold back from movement
= example: to close within bounds, limit or hold back from movement
= synonyms: hold
- to prevent from leaving or from being removed
= example: to prevent from leaving or from being removed
- to deprive of freedom
= example: to deprive of freedom
= synonyms: intern
- to close in
= synonyms: enclose
